long_description: Don't let a broken tent pole spoil your trip. The Gear Aid Tent Pole Splint slides onto your broken tent pole and provides support for as long as you need it. Use duct tape or Gear Aid Tenacious Tape (both sold separately) to hold the splint in place. 1/2 in. size fits most poles on 2 - 3 person backpacking tents and the 5/8 in. fits most 4-person and family-size tents.
short_description: Don't let a broken tent pole spoil your trip. The Gear Aid Tent Pole Splint slides onto your broken tent pole and provides support for as long as you need it.
